A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed parts of this movie but I’m overwhelmed by senses of disappointment and astonishment of what I have witnessed. If you are not super into Star Wars but are interested in watching this you’ll probably like it. BUT if you are a Star Wars fan and are into this story and have a love for this franchise\, this will disappoint you greatly. Not only does it ruin some chances for the some of the most epic moments in Star Wars history\, but it also throws away everything you held dear about this franchise. I don’t want to get into spoilers but there are just straight up ridiculous parts that don’t make any sense even for Star Wars and it misses out on something that could have been great. I went into this movie with high hopes and was left with nothing more than longing for what could have been. I truly hope that this man never makes another Star Wars movie again and that they miraculously make up for everything in episode IX but I don’t see how they can.
